about_the_game:
Cozy Aquarium – Relax, Decorate, and Immerse Yourself

Welcome to Cozy Aquarium, an experience that blends relaxation with productivity. Immerse yourself in a beautifully designed world where you can create, decorate, and manage your very own aquarium while enjoying soothing Lofi music. Whether you want to unwind after a long day or enhance your focus, Cozy Aquarium offers the perfect escape.

Key Features

🌿 Aquarium Decoration – Customize your aquarium with a variety of aquatic plants, decorations, and colorful fish. Let your creativity flow and craft your own underwater paradise!

🐠 Aquarium Management – Build and maintain a thriving aquarium! Take care of your fish, attract visitors, and earn coins to expand and upgrade your aquatic world.

🕒 Productivity Tools – Stay focused with built-in features like the Pomodoro Timer and To-Do List, helping you balance relaxation with efficiency.

🎵 Calming Lofi Soundtrack – Sit back, relax, and enjoy a carefully curated selection of Lofi tracks that create the perfect atmosphere for your aquarium adventure.

✨ Stress-Free Gameplay – No rush, no pressure – Cozy Aquarium lets you play at your own pace and enjoy a peaceful experience.

Cozy Aquarium is more than just a game – it’s a peaceful retreat from the busyness of everyday life. Whether you love decorating, managing, or simply unwinding, this cozy game is the perfect choice for you.

Take a deep breath, dive into the world of Cozy Aquarium, and let the serenity wash over you.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X with 2GB Video RAM

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
